dcterms:creator: J. Candy
dcterms:description: A dataset used to analyze the performance of sigma-delta modulators in converting analog signals to digital form, particularly under conditions of noise.
dcterms:title: Sigma-Delta Modulator (SDM)

dcterms:creator: R. G. Baraniuk
S. Foucart
D. Needell
Y. Plan
M. Wootters
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the reconstruction of sparse signals from binary measurements, demonstrating the exponential decay of reconstruction error.
dcterms:title: One-bit measurements in high-dimensional problems

dcterms:creator: Y. Plan
R. Vershynin
dcterms:description: A dataset that investigates one-bit compressed sensing using linear programming techniques to recover signals from binary measurements.
dcterms:title: One-bit compressed sensing

dcterms:creator: H. Chen
P. K. Varshney
dcterms:description: This dataset examines the performance limits of distributed estimation systems that utilize identical one-bit quantizers.
dcterms:title: Distributed estimation systems with identical one-bit quantizers

dcterms:creator: T. Berger
Z. Zhang
H. Viswanathan
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses the CEO problem, focusing on multiterminal source coding and the estimation of correlated sources.
dcterms:title: CEO problem

dcterms:creator: H. Viswanathan
T. Berger
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the quadratic Gaussian CEO problem, providing insights into the estimation of correlated Gaussian sources.
dcterms:title: Gaussian CEO problem

dcterms:creator: J. C. Duchi
M. I. Jordan
M. J. Wainwright
Y. Zhang
dcterms:description: This dataset provides optimality guarantees for distributed statistical estimation, focusing on the performance of various estimation strategies.
dcterms:title: Distributed statistical estimation

dcterms:creator: A. Xu
M. Raginsky
dcterms:description: This dataset provides information-theoretic lower bounds on Bayes risk in decentralized estimation scenarios.
dcterms:title: Distributed parameter estimation under communication constraints
